summary: The diff removes the Life Lessons nav item from the sidebar and introduces a new removal/placeholder page intended to replace the old experience at the same route. However, motivational-video-specific modules/content/hooks appear to remain in the codebase (and even a new motivational-video validation utility was added), so full decommissioning/cleanup (REQ-7) is not evidenced by the diff summary. The diff also includes substantial unrelated feature work beyond the requested removal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Delete or fully decommission motivational-video-specific frontend modules so there is no remaining dead code or unused assets for this section (page, components, hooks, and content) unless they are still referenced by other active features.
missing_requirements.reason: Motivational-video-specific files are still present (modified, not removed), and at least one new motivational-videos-related utility file was added, which contradicts decommissioning/removal and suggests leftover code/assets may remain.

hallucinated_features.description: Large refactor/additions around local-only data storage and legacy type scaffolding (journal entries, daily inputs, readiness state, caffeine logs, IZOF entries/settings, personal reports) unrelated to removing the Motivational Videos section.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses only on removing the Motivational Videos/Life Lessons section; it explicitly states no backend changes are required and has non-goals to avoid changing other sections. The diff shows broad unrelated changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes/additions to onboarding flow and public landing page content.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-5/6/7 and outside the scope of removing a single Mental Performance section.

hallucinated_features.description: Mission/content updates and new unlock rules in modules content.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of removing the Motivational Videos/Life Lessons UI section.

hallucinated_features.description: Substantial updates to other existing pages/areas (e.g., Journal, Groups/Squads, Admin Reports) not requested and potentially violating the non-goal to not redesign/change other sections.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals specify not redesigning/changing other Mental Performance sections and no additional new sections; the diff summary indicates broad page work beyond the removal.

hallucinated_features.description: New/expanded motivational-video-related utility for validation despite the section being removed.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5/6/7 aim to remove/decommission the motivational videos experience; adding new utilities for motivational videos was not requested.
